home.title: Makes it vegan!
home.headline: We challenge you to complete one of our challenges each day, for 21 days straight!
home.text-signup-login: If you think you've got what it takes, you can sign up or login below.
home.text-about: Take a look here at how the website works!
home.about-intro-1: With this application you can discover the world of vegetables by completing daily challenges.
home.about-step-1-title: You register and/or sign in on the website
home.about-step-1-text: We'll ask a few questions the first time you log in, that way we can personalize all the challenges.
home.about-step-2-text: In case you already have a challenge for today, you'll get to view the challenge and the time that's left to complete it. If you do not have a challenge, you'll be able to request one. Furthermore you can look at the achievements you have unlocked and the previous challenges.
home.about-step-3-text: You can view the details of the challenge by clicking on it. You can also start a new one. You can also take a look at the different type of challenges.
home.about-step-4-text: If you completed the challenge, don't forget to mark it as done on the bottom of the detailed view!
home.about-step-5: Congratulations, you just completed your first challenge!

main.noChallenge: You don't yet have a challenge for today!

errors.socialLoginDisabled: Sorry! Logging in with social accounts is unavailable

errors.passwordMinLength: Password has to be 6 characters long.

challenges.txt_alreadyDone: You have already done this challenge!

create.choose: Choose one of the following challenges!
create.recipe-region-text: Explore the corners of the world and learn what different cultures have to offer of recipes!
create.restaurant-text: No time to cook? Try a vegan restaurant.
create.creative-cooking-text: Clean your fridge and prepare a meal with what your fridge has to offer.

sugarfree.title: Sugarfree
sugarfree.description1: In this challenge, it's intended that you eat sugar free for a whole day.
sugarfree.description2: There are different kinds of sugar and a lot of them are refined or produced with animal remains. For example, cow bones are used to give sugar his bright white color.
sugarfree.description3: We challenge you to avoid all (or as much as possible) products with sugar in it. This means no soft drinks, candy and so on.

recipe.choose: Select one off the following recipes:

loading.social: Contacting Google, Twitter or Facebook at the moment.
loading.settings: Trying to find out more about you...
loading.restaurants: We're looking for some spots for you!

about.title: About
about.text: The EVA 21 days challenge was developed for EVA vzw.
about.text-second: This app wants to inspire people to eat more vegan for 21 days and convince them to use less animal-related products and more alternatives.
about.info: If you want to read more about the goal of EVA, you can always go to their

settings.peopleInFamily: Number of people in your household

badges.starter-desc: You have requested your first challenge.
badges.sugarrush-desc: You have completed your first sugarfree challenge! A day without added sugars, quite the achievement!
badges.creatieveling-desc: You have complete your first vegan recipe!!
badges.explorer-desc: You have prepared your first exotic meal!
badges.gastronoom-desc: You have gone three times to a restaurant, gastronomic.
badges.genieter-desc: You have accomplished your first restaurantchallenge!
badges.trotsegebruiker-desc: You already have finished ten challenges, keep it up!
badges.doorzetter-desc: You have successfully completed the 21 days, congratulations!

restaurant.info-1: We use your location to recommend vegan restaurants in your area.
restaurant.info-2: When you prefer not to use locationservices, we will use the center of Ghent instead, with a range of 20km
restaurant.info-3: When you agree you can press the button and continue.
